Calls upon Parliament to codify what Rights and Benefits citizens of the UK are entitled to but that some or all are CONDITIONAL   with discharging the  Responsibilities and Duties  of being a citizen.

It is right that a rich country such as the UK has compassion for those less fortunate, ill and disabled.

However it is also right that hard working, honest and productive citizens should not have their hard earned cash wasted on those that have no intention of contributing to the benefit of society. It is clear that many prey on the weak, commit crime to the degree that they become serial FELONS  and along with those that Riot against the common good should have public funding withdrawn from them in all its forms for a period to be determined by the courts according to their crimes.

Compassion = Yes
Preying on Society = No.
